items.raw: **16:20** Active-session behavior was still ambiguous between Telegram, WebRTC FAB, and session pages; users could implicitly fall back to unrelated open sessions instead of deterministic explicit active-session routing.
items.short: Active-session behavior was still ambiguous between Telegram, WebRTC FAB, and session pages; users could implicitly fall back to unrelated open sessions instead of deterministic explicit active-session routing.

items.raw: **16:20** Socket session-closing flow trusted client payload context for user mapping and did not uniformly enforce session/project access checks across mutating socket events.
items.short: Socket session-closing flow trusted client payload context for user mapping and did not uniformly enforce session/project access checks across mutating socket events.

items.raw: **16:20** Shared Mongo/Redis between prod and beta runtimes allowed cross-runtime workers to pick foreign sessions/messages, causing stuck processing and environment leakage.
items.short: Shared Mongo/Redis between prod and beta runtimes allowed cross-runtime workers to pick foreign sessions/messages, causing stuck processing and environment leakage.

items.raw: **16:20** Deleting transcript segments could leave stale overlapping categorization rows in message projections, causing UI inconsistency between Transcription and Categorization tabs.
items.short: Deleting transcript segments could leave stale overlapping categorization rows in message projections, causing UI inconsistency between Transcription and Categorization tabs.

items.raw: **17:33** Telegram responses were inconsistent (`prefix + field headers`) across `/start`, `/session`, `/done`, and postprocessing events, which complicated quick parsing and copy/reuse in chat operations.
items.short: Telegram responses were inconsistent (`prefix + field headers`) across `/start`, `/session`, `/done`, and postprocessing events, which complicated quick parsing and copy/reuse in chat operations.

items.raw: **17:33** `/login` behavior still depended on active-session context, while operators needed a deterministic auth-entry link regardless of current session mapping.
items.short: `/login` behavior still depended on active-session context, while operators needed a deterministic auth-entry link regardless of current session mapping.

items.raw: **17:33** Session page controls/status did not match the new FAB `New/Rec` contract, so operators could not trigger explicit `Rec` from a session row with a predictable active-session sync.
items.short: Session page controls/status did not match the new FAB `New/Rec` contract, so operators could not trigger explicit `Rec` from a session row with a predictable active-session sync.

items.raw: **17:52** Session status pictogram near session-page action buttons was not fully tied to runtime `State` values (`cutting`, `final_uploading`, `error`, etc.), so operators lost quick visual feedback for real recorder state.
items.short: Session status pictogram near session-page action buttons was not fully tied to runtime `State` values (`cutting`, `final_uploading`, `error`, etc.), so operators lost quick visual feedback for real recorder state.

items.raw: **18:25** Opening `/session/:id` for a session inaccessible in the current runtime showed endless spinner instead of an explicit "session not found / runtime mismatch" state.
items.short: Opening `/session/:id` for a session inaccessible in the current runtime showed endless spinner instead of an explicit "session not found / runtime mismatch" state.

items.raw: **16:20** Implemented strict active-session semantics across TG/Web/WebRTC:
items.short: Implemented strict active-session semantics across TG/Web/WebRTC:

items.raw: **16:20** Added Web API + UI active-session controls:
items.short: Added Web API + UI active-session controls:

items.raw: **16:20** Added runtime isolation contract:
items.short: Added runtime isolation contract:

items.raw: **16:20** Hardened socket contracts:
items.short: Hardened socket contracts:

items.raw: **17:33** Unified Telegram session-event output to a strict 4-line message contract:
items.short: Unified Telegram session-event output to a strict 4-line message contract:

items.raw: **17:33** Reworked `/login` to issue one-time `tg_auth` links (token in `automation_one_use_tokens`), fully independent of active-session state.
items.short: Reworked `/login` to issue one-time `tg_auth` links (token in `automation_one_use_tokens`), fully independent of active-session state.

items.raw: **17:33** Updated session page UI actions to `Rec / Activate / Done` with FAB state sync and visual status markers (`rec/pause/closed`).
items.short: Updated session page UI actions to `Rec / Activate / Done` with FAB state sync and visual status markers (`rec/pause/closed`).

items.raw: **17:52** Finalized session-page controls to `New / Rec / Cut / Pause / Done` (same order as FAB) and switched left-side pictogram to full state-driven mapping.
items.short: Finalized session-page controls to `New / Rec / Cut / Pause / Done` (same order as FAB) and switched left-side pictogram to full state-driven mapping.

items.raw: **18:25** Improved session-page resilience on 404 response from `/voicebot/session` by introducing explicit runtime-mismatch UI and retry-safe error rendering when a session is outside the active runtime.
items.short: Improved session-page resilience on 404 response from `/voicebot/session` by introducing explicit runtime-mismatch UI and retry-safe error rendering when a session is outside the active runtime.

items.raw: **16:20** Backend session flow updates:
items.short: Backend session flow updates:

items.raw: **16:20** Runtime isolation implementation:
items.short: Runtime isolation implementation:

items.raw: **16:20** API/routes and frontend integration:
items.short: API/routes and frontend integration:

items.raw: **16:20** Reliability and compatibility coverage:
items.short: Reliability and compatibility coverage:

items.raw: **17:33** Added shared formatter module `voicebot/session_telegram_message.js` and switched message producers (`voicebot-tgbot.js`, `voicebot/common_jobs/done_multiprompt.js`, `voicebot/postprocessing/all_custom_prompts.js`) to unified event output.
items.short: Added shared formatter module `voicebot/session_telegram_message.js` and switched message producers (`voicebot-tgbot.js`, `voicebot/common_jobs/done_multiprompt.js`, `voicebot/postprocessing/all_custom_prompts.js`) to unified event output.

items.raw: **17:33** Updated Telegram `/login` path in `voicebot-tgbot.js`: token generation (`crypto.randomBytes`), persistence in one-use tokens collection, and command/help text updates.
items.short: Updated Telegram `/login` path in `voicebot-tgbot.js`: token generation (`crypto.randomBytes`), persistence in one-use tokens collection, and command/help text updates.

items.raw: **17:33** Updated `app/src/components/voicebot/MeetingCard.jsx` with `Rec / Activate / Done`, active-session localStorage/event sync to FAB, and rec/pause/closed status icon rendering.
items.short: Updated `app/src/components/voicebot/MeetingCard.jsx` with `Rec / Activate / Done`, active-session localStorage/event sync to FAB, and rec/pause/closed status icon rendering.

items.raw: **17:52** Updated `app/src/components/voicebot/MeetingCard.jsx` status icon mapping to runtime states:
items.short: Updated `app/src/components/voicebot/MeetingCard.jsx` status icon mapping to runtime states:

items.raw: **17:52** Updated `plan/session-managment.md` and `README.md` to align documentation with the new button order and state-driven pictogram contract.
items.short: Updated `plan/session-managment.md` and `README.md` to align documentation with the new button order and state-driven pictogram contract.

items.raw: **17:33** Updated session management spec in `plan/session-managment.md` to document `/login` one-time auth-link semantics.
items.short: Updated session management spec in `plan/session-managment.md` to document `/login` one-time auth-link semantics.

items.raw: **17:33** Adjusted `__tests__/common_jobs/done_multiprompt.test.js` assertions to validate the new 4-line Telegram message contract.
items.short: Adjusted `__tests__/common_jobs/done_multiprompt.test.js` assertions to validate the new 4-line Telegram message contract.

items.raw: **18:25** Updated session fetch UX in `app/src/store/voiceBot.js` + `app/src/pages/SessionPage.jsx` and enriched request diagnostics in `app/src/store/request.js` to distinguish 404 runtime-mismatch states from other load errors.
items.short: Updated session fetch UX in `app/src/store/voiceBot.js` + `app/src/pages/SessionPage.jsx` and enriched request diagnostics in `app/src/store/request.js` to distinguish 404 runtime-mismatch states from other load errors.

items.raw: **07:19** Telegram screenshot/document attachments were not consistently accessible to external processors (LLM/MCP) because the only supported path required session auth and depended on message ids; we now provide a stable, direct attachment contract without exposing Telegram bot tokens.
items.short: Telegram screenshot/document attachments were not consistently accessible to external processors (LLM/MCP) because the only supported path required session auth and depended on message ids; we now provide a stable, direct attachment contract without exposing Telegram bot tokens.

items.raw: **07:19** External attachment links needed to be explicit about compatibility between legacy UI consumption and stable public access; mixed behavior could break automation consumers and direct download tooling.
items.short: External attachment links needed to be explicit about compatibility between legacy UI consumption and stable public access; mixed behavior could break automation consumers and direct download tooling.

items.raw: **07:19** Added a stable public attachment endpoint: `GET /voicebot/public_attachment/:session_id/:file_unique_id` for Telegram-only attachments (no session auth, lookup by session + file_unique_id).
items.short: Added a stable public attachment endpoint: `GET /voicebot/public_attachment/:session_id/:file_unique_id` for Telegram-only attachments (no session auth, lookup by session + file_unique_id).

items.raw: **07:19** Extended `session_attachments` payload to include both legacy protected `uri` and optional `direct_uri` so existing UI flow stays intact while external consumers get stable references.
items.short: Extended `session_attachments` payload to include both legacy protected `uri` and optional `direct_uri` so existing UI flow stays intact while external consumers get stable references.

items.raw: **07:19** Added direct rendering path in `Screenshort` for `direct_uri` with protected fallback to `/voicebot/message_attachment/...`.
items.short: Added direct rendering path in `Screenshort` for `direct_uri` with protected fallback to `/voicebot/message_attachment/...`.

items.raw: **07:19** Backend: added public attachment resolver and stream proxy in `crm/controllers/voicebot.js`, and registered public route in `crm/routes/voicebot.js`.
items.short: Backend: added public attachment resolver and stream proxy in `crm/controllers/voicebot.js`, and registered public route in `crm/routes/voicebot.js`.

items.raw: **07:19** Backend auth gate updated in `voicebot-backend.js` to allow unauthenticated `/voicebot/public_attachment/*` requests for public retrieval.
items.short: Backend auth gate updated in `voicebot-backend.js` to allow unauthenticated `/voicebot/public_attachment/*` requests for public retrieval.

items.raw: **07:19** Frontend: updated `Screenshort.jsx` and attachment normalization in `app/src/store/voiceBot.js` to consume `direct_uri` safely.
items.short: Frontend: updated `Screenshort.jsx` and attachment normalization in `app/src/store/voiceBot.js` to consume `direct_uri` safely.

items.raw: **07:19** Tests/docs: added/extended API+smoke coverage and docs for public attachment delivery in:
items.short: Tests/docs: added/extended API+smoke coverage and docs for public attachment delivery in:

items.raw: **15:00** Telegram voice bot session behavior was not aligned for deterministic handoff, with unclear active-session ownership semantics across `/start`, `/done`, and incoming content messages.
items.short: Telegram voice bot session behavior was not aligned for deterministic handoff, with unclear active-session ownership semantics across `/start`, `/done`, and incoming content messages.

items.raw: **15:00** Session selection behavior for forwarded content and user-owned active sessions was undefined, creating inconsistency in how new voice/text messages should be attached.
items.short: Session selection behavior for forwarded content and user-owned active sessions was undefined, creating inconsistency in how new voice/text messages should be attached.

items.raw: **09:43** Telegram bot command discoverability and login entrypoint were still not codified for operators, increasing support overhead during command onboarding.
items.short: Telegram bot command discoverability and login entrypoint were still not codified for operators, increasing support overhead during command onboarding.

items.raw: **17:30** Telegram screenshots/documents did not have a token-safe way to render in Web UI; direct Telegram file URLs would leak bot tokens and attachments were not exposed as a stable UI read model.
items.short: Telegram screenshots/documents did not have a token-safe way to render in Web UI; direct Telegram file URLs would leak bot tokens and attachments were not exposed as a stable UI read model.

items.raw: **16:01** OpenAI quota failures could stall transcription or categorization indefinitely, requiring manual restarts even after the balance was restored.
items.short: OpenAI quota failures could stall transcription or categorization indefinitely, requiring manual restarts even after the balance was restored.

items.raw: **19:53** `/session` and `/login` responses could still surface internal session URLs and did not consistently expose session metadata, forcing manual mapping when users revisited existing sessions.
items.short: `/session` and `/login` responses could still surface internal session URLs and did not consistently expose session metadata, forcing manual mapping when users revisited existing sessions.

items.raw: **21:12** Redis queue overload (maxmemory + noeviction) could stall sequential processors: BullMQ enqueue failed while `is_processing` flags were already set, causing categorization/transcription to loop in a stale-reset state without making progress.
items.short: Redis queue overload (maxmemory + noeviction) could stall sequential processors: BullMQ enqueue failed while `is_processing` flags were already set, causing categorization/transcription to loop in a stale-reset state without making progress.

items.raw: **21:31** Redis cleanup automation was too conservative for high-throughput queues and included an unsafe emergency path that could delete waiting jobs; cleanup is now bounded and safe (history-only) with stream trimming.
items.short: Redis cleanup automation was too conservative for high-throughput queues and included an unsafe emergency path that could delete waiting jobs; cleanup is now bounded and safe (history-only) with stream trimming.

items.raw: **22:10** OpenAI spend could spike because categorization ran on trivial short text messages and used a long instruction prompt; categorization now skips trivial short texts/commands and defaults to a cheaper model (configurable).
items.short: OpenAI spend could spike because categorization ran on trivial short text messages and used a long instruction prompt; categorization now skips trivial short texts/commands and defaults to a cheaper model (configurable).

items.raw: **15:00** Added an explicit planning document that defines Telegram voicebot session lifecycle and routing behavior (`plan/session-managment.md`): active session model, command semantics, and session-link normalization/representation.
items.short: Added an explicit planning document that defines Telegram voicebot session lifecycle and routing behavior (`plan/session-managment.md`): active session model, command semantics, and session-link normalization/representation.

items.raw: **09:43** Extended the Telegram session plan with a dedicated `/login` command and explicit `@strato_voice_bot` command set for operator operations (`/start`, `/done`, `/session`, `/login`).
items.short: Extended the Telegram session plan with a dedicated `/login` command and explicit `@strato_voice_bot` command set for operator operations (`/start`, `/done`, `/session`, `/login`).

items.raw: **17:30** Added session attachments support end-to-end:
items.short: Added session attachments support end-to-end:

items.raw: **17:30** UI: added `Screenshort` tab to render screenshots/documents (preview + caption + timestamp).
items.short: UI: added `Screenshort` tab to render screenshots/documents (preview + caption + timestamp).

items.raw: **17:30** LLM context: screenshots/documents are included in categorization/create_tasks input via structured blocks without triggering transcription loops.
items.short: LLM context: screenshots/documents are included in categorization/create_tasks input via structured blocks without triggering transcription loops.

items.raw: **17:30** Added Jest smoke tests for the Telegram attachment flow and the attachment proxy endpoint.
items.short: Added Jest smoke tests for the Telegram attachment flow and the attachment proxy endpoint.

items.raw: **16:01** Processing loop now auto-recovers quota-stopped work: once account balance is restored, transcription and categorization jobs requeue automatically without manual intervention, and quota markers are safely reset once successful.
items.short: Processing loop now auto-recovers quota-stopped work: once account balance is restored, transcription and categorization jobs requeue automatically without manual intervention, and quota markers are safely reset once successful.

items.raw: **19:53** Telegram command responses were normalized to public host links and enriched with structured metadata:
items.short: Telegram command responses were normalized to public host links and enriched with structured metadata:

items.raw: **19:53** Added exponential retry limits and backoff metadata for transcription/categorization recovery (`transcription_attempts`, `categorization_attempts`, `*_next_attempt_at`) with hard fail markers to prevent endless retries.
items.short: Added exponential retry limits and backoff metadata for transcription/categorization recovery (`transcription_attempts`, `categorization_attempts`, `*_next_attempt_at`) with hard fail markers to prevent endless retries.

items.raw: **21:12** Hardened BullMQ queue behavior to prevent Redis OOM stalls:
items.short: Hardened BullMQ queue behavior to prevent Redis OOM stalls:

items.raw: **21:31** Improved Redis protection rails:
items.short: Improved Redis protection rails:

items.raw: **22:10** Added LLM cost controls:
items.short: Added LLM cost controls:

items.raw: **15:00** Added `plan/session-managment.md` with a complete requirements and execution-ready design for:
items.short: Added `plan/session-managment.md` with a complete requirements and execution-ready design for:

items.raw: **09:43** Updated the same session-management specification to include:
items.short: Updated the same session-management specification to include:

items.raw: **17:30** Backend: added `GET /voicebot/message_attachment/:message_id/:attachment_index`, extended message persistence with `message_type` + `attachments[]`, introduced `HANDLE_ATTACHMENT` job + idempotency for Telegram retries, and exposed `session_attachments` via `POST /voicebot/session`.
items.short: Backend: added `GET /voicebot/message_attachment/:message_id/:attachment_index`, extended message persistence with `message_type` + `attachments[]`, introduced `HANDLE_ATTACHMENT` job + idempotency for Telegram retries, and exposed `session_attachments` via `POST /voicebot/session`.

items.raw: **17:30** Frontend: added `Screenshort` tab/component and wired session attachment URIs for Telegram/web sources.
items.short: Frontend: added `Screenshort` tab/component and wired session attachment URIs for Telegram/web sources.

items.raw: **17:30** Docs/tests: updated `docs/VOICEBOT_API*.md`, added smoke tests under `__tests__/smoke/`, and linked implementation tasks in `plan/session-managment.md`.
items.short: Docs/tests: updated `docs/VOICEBOT_API*.md`, added smoke tests under `__tests__/smoke/`, and linked implementation tasks in `plan/session-managment.md`.

items.raw: **16:01** Backend: updated auto-retry loop (`voicebot/common_jobs/processing_loop.js`) and processors (`voicebot/voice_jobs/transcribe.js`, `voicebot/voice_jobs/categorize.js`) to treat `insufficient_quota` as retryable without terminal corruption and reset quota-lock state after successful retry.
items.short: Backend: updated auto-retry loop (`voicebot/common_jobs/processing_loop.js`) and processors (`voicebot/voice_jobs/transcribe.js`, `voicebot/voice_jobs/categorize.js`) to treat `insufficient_quota` as retryable without terminal corruption and reset quota-lock state after successful retry.

items.raw: **19:53** Telegram bot formatting and session state resolution updates:
items.short: Telegram bot formatting and session state resolution updates:

items.raw: **19:53** Retry controls and hard-stop behavior:
items.short: Retry controls and hard-stop behavior:

items.raw: **21:12** Queue retention + enqueue safety:
items.short: Queue retention + enqueue safety:

items.raw: **21:31** `voicebot/redis_monitor.js` emergency cleanup no longer risks dropping queued work (`wait`), and additionally trims `bull:<queue>:events` streams.
items.short: `voicebot/redis_monitor.js` emergency cleanup no longer risks dropping queued work (`wait`), and additionally trims `bull:<queue>:events` streams.

items.raw: **22:10** Reduced LLM token usage by shortening categorization/task prompts and adding short-text skip guards in the categorization processor.
items.short: Reduced LLM token usage by shortening categorization/task prompts and adding short-text skip guards in the categorization processor.

items.raw: **22:36** Docs: documented LLM cost control env knobs and updated the auto-reprocessing notes in `README.md`/`AGENTS.md`.
items.short: Docs: documented LLM cost control env knobs and updated the auto-reprocessing notes in `README.md`/`AGENTS.md`.

items.raw: **06:55** Large web audio uploads could appear stuck at 0% because the UI progress only advanced after the request completed; the uploader now tracks byte-level progress during upload.
items.short: Large web audio uploads could appear stuck at 0% because the UI progress only advanced after the request completed; the uploader now tracks byte-level progress during upload.

items.raw: **06:57** Uploads between 500MB and 600MB could fail at the edge due to a lower request body limit; the edge Nginx limit was raised to align with the product's 600MB cap.
items.short: Uploads between 500MB and 600MB could fail at the edge due to a lower request body limit; the edge Nginx limit was raised to align with the product's 600MB cap.

items.raw: **06:55** Added real-time upload feedback for large audio files (file name + uploaded MB / total MB) while a web upload is in progress.
items.short: Added real-time upload feedback for large audio files (file name + uploaded MB / total MB) while a web upload is in progress.

items.raw: **06:55** Frontend: added axios upload progress tracking and improved error hints for common failures (413, network, timeouts).
items.short: Frontend: added axios upload progress tracking and improved error hints for common failures (413, network, timeouts).

items.raw: **06:55** Frontend: stopped forcing the multipart Content-Type header so the browser/axios can set the correct boundary automatically.
items.short: Frontend: stopped forcing the multipart Content-Type header so the browser/axios can set the correct boundary automatically.

items.raw: **06:55** Docs: documented where source WebM/audio files live on disk and how duration backfill is computed (including an ffprobe fallback) in `AGENTS.md`.
items.short: Docs: documented where source WebM/audio files live on disk and how duration backfill is computed (including an ffprobe fallback) in `AGENTS.md`.

items.raw: **06:57** Ops (edge): increased Nginx request body size limit to `700m` and upload body timeout to `600s` for `voice.stratospace.fun`.
items.short: Ops (edge): increased Nginx request body size limit to `700m` and upload body timeout to `600s` for `voice.stratospace.fun`.

items.raw: **09:45** Transcription chunk actions overlapped content and were inconsistent across segments; the UI now renders Copy/Edit/Delete in the free space above the chunk text (hover-only) and reserves safe right padding to prevent overlap.
items.short: Transcription chunk actions overlapped content and were inconsistent across segments; the UI now renders Copy/Edit/Delete in the free space above the chunk text (hover-only) and reserves safe right padding to prevent overlap.

items.raw: **09:45** Session/message durations were frequently zero or derived from unstable indexes, breaking timeline rendering and downstream analytics; duration is now resolved from message/chunk metadata and `ffprobe` as needed, and canonical segments are rebuilt with monotonic start/end times.
items.short: Session/message durations were frequently zero or derived from unstable indexes, breaking timeline rendering and downstream analytics; duration is now resolved from message/chunk metadata and `ffprobe` as needed, and canonical segments are rebuilt with monotonic start/end times.

items.raw: **09:45** Closing a multiprompt session could unexpectedly spawn a new session automatically; the done handler now only closes the current session and emits update/notify events.
items.short: Closing a multiprompt session could unexpectedly spawn a new session automatically; the done handler now only closes the current session and emits update/notify events.

items.raw: **09:45** Added Copy action for transcription segments (hover-only) and an inline timeline label under the segment text (`HH:mm, mm:ss - mm:ss`) derived from canonical transcription or legacy chunks.
items.short: Added Copy action for transcription segments (hover-only) and an inline timeline label under the segment text (`HH:mm, mm:ss - mm:ss`) derived from canonical transcription or legacy chunks.

items.raw: **09:45** Added `services/transcriptionTimeline.js` to normalize legacy `transcription_chunks[]` into a stable timeline and to resolve duration consistently across sources.
items.short: Added `services/transcriptionTimeline.js` to normalize legacy `transcription_chunks[]` into a stable timeline and to resolve duration consistently across sources.

items.raw: **09:45** Added diagnostics CLI `node cli/diagnostics/recalc_session_duration.js <sessionId> [--apply]` to recompute and optionally backfill message/session durations.
items.short: Added diagnostics CLI `node cli/diagnostics/recalc_session_duration.js <sessionId> [--apply]` to recompute and optionally backfill message/session durations.

items.raw: **09:45** Added unit tests for timeline normalization and session-close behavior.
items.short: Added unit tests for timeline normalization and session-close behavior.

items.raw: **09:45** Backend: improved audio duration probing via `ffprobe` JSON (`utils/audio_utils.js`), persisted upload duration in `crm/controllers/audio_upload.js`, and used timeline normalization in `crm/controllers/voicebot.js` and `voicebot/voice_jobs/transcribe.js`.
items.short: Backend: improved audio duration probing via `ffprobe` JSON (`utils/audio_utils.js`), persisted upload duration in `crm/controllers/audio_upload.js`, and used timeline normalization in `crm/controllers/voicebot.js` and `voicebot/voice_jobs/transcribe.js`.

items.raw: **09:45** Frontend: simplified the Transcription table header (removed the standalone time column) and polished segment rendering/actions in `TranscriptionTableRow.jsx`.
items.short: Frontend: simplified the Transcription table header (removed the standalone time column) and polished segment rendering/actions in `TranscriptionTableRow.jsx`.

items.raw: **09:45** Planning: added WBS + Mermaid artifacts for spec tracking (`plan/spec-task-breakdown-v1.md`, `plan/spec-wbs-status.png`).
items.short: Planning: added WBS + Mermaid artifacts for spec tracking (`plan/spec-task-breakdown-v1.md`, `plan/spec-wbs-status.png`).

items.raw: **05:22** Planning requirements for a large event-log/edit/rollback initiative were scattered across discussions; this session captures the source planning input in-repo for traceability and coordinated implementation.
items.short: Planning requirements for a large event-log/edit/rollback initiative were scattered across discussions; this session captures the source planning input in-repo for traceability and coordinated implementation.

items.raw: **08:35** Planning specs drifted on transcript identity and storage layers, mixing canonical transcription facts with UI-facing chunk lists; specs now converge on an immutable `transcription_raw -> transcription` chain and treat list views as derived/legacy.
items.short: Planning specs drifted on transcript identity and storage layers, mixing canonical transcription facts with UI-facing chunk lists; specs now converge on an immutable `transcription_raw -> transcription` chain and treat list views as derived/legacy.

items.raw: **09:12** Closed the remaining blocker on transcript version storage by locking versions at the session level, with session API responses returning only the effective final transcript after edits.
items.short: Closed the remaining blocker on transcript version storage by locking versions at the session level, with session API responses returning only the effective final transcript after edits.

items.raw: **09:14** Closed the remaining blocker on speaker display defaults by locking technical-label rendering to ` 1/2/...` while preserving raw labels in immutable transcription facts.
items.short: Closed the remaining blocker on speaker display defaults by locking technical-label rendering to ` 1/2/...` while preserving raw labels in immutable transcription facts.

items.raw: **18:31** Transcript segment edits lacked a durable audit trail and safe rollback semantics; introduced an append-only session log with replayable events for edit/delete/rollback actions.
items.short: Transcript segment edits lacked a durable audit trail and safe rollback semantics; introduced an append-only session log with replayable events for edit/delete/rollback actions.

items.raw: **19:06** Operators could not edit or delete transcript segments directly in the Transcription tab; added UI controls wired to the new edit/delete endpoints.
items.short: Operators could not edit or delete transcript segments directly in the Transcription tab; added UI controls wired to the new edit/delete endpoints.

items.raw: **19:25** Segment editing was modal-heavy and required a mandatory reason for destructive actions; moved to inline editing, hover-only actions, immediate delete, and optional reason.
items.short: Segment editing was modal-heavy and required a mandatory reason for destructive actions; moved to inline editing, hover-only actions, immediate delete, and optional reason.

items.raw: **05:22** Added raw stakeholder planning artifact `plan/edit-event-log-req.md` as the baseline input for the upcoming event-log specification work.
items.short: Added raw stakeholder planning artifact `plan/edit-event-log-req.md` as the baseline input for the upcoming event-log specification work.

items.raw: **08:35** Added an event-log/edit/rollback spec draft (`plan/edit-event-log-plan.md`) aligned to immutable facts, append-only events, and replayable projections.
items.short: Added an event-log/edit/rollback spec draft (`plan/edit-event-log-plan.md`) aligned to immutable facts, append-only events, and replayable projections.

items.raw: **08:35** Refined the diarization migration plan to make `transcription_raw -> transcription` the canonical immutable storage contract and documented the model-agnostic `transcription` schema.
items.short: Refined the diarization migration plan to make `transcription_raw -> transcription` the canonical immutable storage contract and documented the model-agnostic `transcription` schema.

items.raw: **09:18** Added a consolidated launch draft `plan/implementation-draft-v1.md` with decision-locked staged execution (`event-log -> diarization`).
items.short: Added a consolidated launch draft `plan/implementation-draft-v1.md` with decision-locked staged execution (`event-log -> diarization`).

items.raw: **18:31** Added session log storage and CRM endpoints for transcript segment edit/delete/rollback, aligned to lowercase snake_case event taxonomy and replay-friendly actor/target metadata.
items.short: Added session log storage and CRM endpoints for transcript segment edit/delete/rollback, aligned to lowercase snake_case event taxonomy and replay-friendly actor/target metadata.

items.raw: **19:06** Added Transcription tab segment actions (edit/delete) plus a Log tab to surface session events.
items.short: Added Transcription tab segment actions (edit/delete) plus a Log tab to surface session events.

items.raw: **19:25** Updated the UI to show segment actions on hover only, make `reason` optional across action endpoints, and move the Log tab to the end of the tab bar.
items.short: Updated the UI to show segment actions on hover only, make `reason` optional across action endpoints, and move the Log tab to the end of the tab bar.

items.raw: **05:22** Updated `AGENTS.md`, `README.md`, and `CHANGELOG.md` to document planning-artifact placement and close-session outcomes.
items.short: Updated `AGENTS.md`, `README.md`, and `CHANGELOG.md` to document planning-artifact placement and close-session outcomes.

items.raw: **08:35** Planning specs: updated `plan/gpt-4o-transcribe-diarize-plan.md` to clarify the minimal immutable transcription contract and added `plan/edit-event-log-plan.md` for segment edits/rollback.
items.short: Planning specs: updated `plan/gpt-4o-transcribe-diarize-plan.md` to clarify the minimal immutable transcription contract and added `plan/edit-event-log-plan.md` for segment edits/rollback.

items.raw: **08:35** No runtime, API, database, or production behavior changes were introduced by these planning/spec updates.
items.short: No runtime, API, database, or production behavior changes were introduced by these planning/spec updates.

items.raw: **09:22** Synchronized locked clarification outcomes across `plan/edit-event-log-plan.md`, `plan/gpt-4o-transcribe-diarize-plan.md`, and `plan/edit-event-log-req.md`.
items.short: Synchronized locked clarification outcomes across `plan/edit-event-log-plan.md`, `plan/gpt-4o-transcribe-diarize-plan.md`, and `plan/edit-event-log-req.md`.

items.raw: **09:24** Updated planning references in `AGENTS.md` and `README.md` to include `plan/implementation-draft-v1.md` and session-level transcript-versioning semantics.
items.short: Updated planning references in `AGENTS.md` and `README.md` to include `plan/implementation-draft-v1.md` and session-level transcript-versioning semantics.

items.raw: **18:31** Backend: introduced `automation_voice_bot_session_log` storage and API routes for segment actions (`crm/controllers/voicebot.js`) to support replayable history and rollback.
items.short: Backend: introduced `automation_voice_bot_session_log` storage and API routes for segment actions (`crm/controllers/voicebot.js`) to support replayable history and rollback.

items.raw: **19:06** Frontend: added Transcription and Log tab UI for segment operations and event visibility (segment-level edit/delete wiring).
items.short: Frontend: added Transcription and Log tab UI for segment operations and event visibility (segment-level edit/delete wiring).

items.raw: **19:25** Frontend/backend: removed required `reason` validation for action endpoints and streamlined the editing workflow to be inline (no modal).
items.short: Frontend/backend: removed required `reason` validation for action endpoints and streamlined the editing workflow to be inline (no modal).

items.raw: **07:10** Sessions could not be summarized on-demand when a project was missing or the automatic conditions hadn't fired; the UI can now manually enqueue `session_ready_to_summarize` with a PMO fallback project, without affecting the standard automatic trigger.
items.short: Sessions could not be summarized on-demand when a project was missing or the automatic conditions hadn't fired; the UI can now manually enqueue `session_ready_to_summarize` with a PMO fallback project, without affecting the standard automatic trigger.

items.raw: **08:32** Circle action buttons in the session header were visually misaligned (icons shifted up), making actions appear on different levels; icons are now centered so the buttons align consistently.
items.short: Circle action buttons in the session header were visually misaligned (icons shifted up), making actions appear on different levels; icons are now centered so the buttons align consistently.

items.raw: **07:10** Added a `Summarize ()` action next to the AI title generator to trigger summarization and disable itself for 3 minutes.
items.short: Added a `Summarize ()` action next to the AI title generator to trigger summarization and disable itself for 3 minutes.

items.raw: **07:10** Added `POST /voicebot/trigger_session_ready_to_summarize` to (1) assign PMO when `project_id` is missing and (2) enqueue the `session_ready_to_summarize` notify event (hooks from `notifies.hooks.yaml` will run via the notifies worker).
items.short: Added `POST /voicebot/trigger_session_ready_to_summarize` to (1) assign PMO when `project_id` is missing and (2) enqueue the `session_ready_to_summarize` notify event (hooks from `notifies.hooks.yaml` will run via the notifies worker).

items.raw: **07:10** Added Jest unit + integration tests and API docs for `/voicebot/create_session`, `/voicebot/add_text`, and `/voicebot/trigger_session_ready_to_summarize`.
items.short: Added Jest unit + integration tests and API docs for `/voicebot/create_session`, `/voicebot/add_text`, and `/voicebot/trigger_session_ready_to_summarize`.

items.raw: **07:10** Frontend: `MeetingCard.jsx` and `voiceBot.js` add manual summarize trigger + 3-minute cooldown.
items.short: Frontend: `MeetingCard.jsx` and `voiceBot.js` add manual summarize trigger + 3-minute cooldown.

items.raw: **07:10** Backend: `crm/controllers/voicebot.js`, `crm/routes/voicebot.js` add manual summarize endpoint (PMO assign + notify enqueue).
items.short: Backend: `crm/controllers/voicebot.js`, `crm/routes/voicebot.js` add manual summarize endpoint (PMO assign + notify enqueue).

items.raw: **07:10** Tests/docs: `__tests__/controllers/*`, `__tests__/setup.js`, plus `docs/VOICEBOT_API*.md`.
items.short: Tests/docs: `__tests__/controllers/*`, `__tests__/setup.js`, plus `docs/VOICEBOT_API*.md`.

items.raw: **08:32** Frontend: centered icon rendering for circle action buttons in `MeetingCard.jsx` to avoid baseline drift.
items.short: Frontend: centered icon rendering for circle action buttons in `MeetingCard.jsx` to avoid baseline drift.

items.raw: **13:35** Session project assignment notifies were emitted on rename and lacked change context; notifies now fire only when `project_id` actually changes and include old/new project ids.
items.short: Session project assignment notifies were emitted on rename and lacked change context; notifies now fire only when `project_id` actually changes and include old/new project ids.

items.raw: **22:00** Local notify hooks could fail silently (detached spawn with ignored stdio), making production debugging difficult; hook runner now logs starts and spawn failures with `event`, `cmd`, `session_id`, and payload context.
items.short: Local notify hooks could fail silently (detached spawn with ignored stdio), making production debugging difficult; hook runner now logs starts and spawn failures with `event`, `cmd`, `session_id`, and payload context.

items.raw: **13:35** Introduced `session_ready_to_summarize` notify event when both conditions are met: session is closed and `project_id` is assigned (emitted on close or on project assignment for already closed sessions).
items.short: Introduced `session_ready_to_summarize` notify event when both conditions are met: session is closed and `project_id` is assigned (emitted on close or on project assignment for already closed sessions).

items.raw: **13:35** Added an optional local notify hooks runner (YAML/JSON config) so events can trigger background commands (for example StratoProject summarization) without blocking the queue worker.
items.short: Added an optional local notify hooks runner (YAML/JSON config) so events can trigger background commands (for example StratoProject summarization) without blocking the queue worker.

items.raw: **13:35** Added `VOICE_BOT_NOTIFY_HOOKS_CONFIG` to `.env.example` and added `notifies.hooks.yaml` sample config.
items.short: Added `VOICE_BOT_NOTIFY_HOOKS_CONFIG` to `.env.example` and added `notifies.hooks.yaml` sample config.

items.raw: **22:00** Updated the sample hooks config to use an absolute `uv` path to avoid PATH differences under PM2/systemd.
items.short: Updated the sample hooks config to use an absolute `uv` path to avoid PATH differences under PM2/systemd.

items.raw: **13:35** Ignored fast-agent local artifacts (`agents/.venv/`, `agents/logs/`) in `.gitignore`.
items.short: Ignored fast-agent local artifacts (`agents/.venv/`, `agents/logs/`) in `.gitignore`.

items.raw: **13:35** Bumped frontend package version to `0.0.39` (`app/package.json`).
items.short: Bumped frontend package version to `0.0.39` (`app/package.json`).

items.raw: Closed sessions could not accept web audio uploads, blocking late chunks from entering the processing pipeline.
items.short: Closed sessions could not accept web audio uploads, blocking late chunks from entering the processing pipeline.

items.raw: None.
items.short: None.

items.raw: Allow `/voicebot/upload_audio` to accept inactive sessions unless `is_deleted=true` (`crm/controllers/audio_upload.js`).
items.short: Allow `/voicebot/upload_audio` to accept inactive sessions unless `is_deleted=true` (`crm/controllers/audio_upload.js`).

items.raw: Keep the upload UI available for closed sessions and disable only when the session is deleted (`app/src/components/voicebot/SessionStatusWidget.jsx`).
items.short: Keep the upload UI available for closed sessions and disable only when the session is deleted (`app/src/components/voicebot/SessionStatusWidget.jsx`).

items.raw: Bumped frontend package version to `0.0.38` (`app/package.json`).
items.short: Bumped frontend package version to `0.0.38` (`app/package.json`).
